difficulty_chip.personal_tooltip: This difficulty suggestion is personal and should not be used for difficulty placements

full_challenge_select.full_game_label: Select Map OR Full Game Challenge

components.verifier_icon: Part of the Modded Golden Team

external_link.warning: You are about to open an external link. Click this to continue:

recent_submissions.title: Recent Submissions
recent_submissions.new_challenge_note: This is a new challenge not yet in the database!

changelog.name: Changelog
changelog.entry_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this changelog entry?

top_golden_list.empty: Looks pretty empty. Get some goldens from the Top Golden List to populate your own list!
top_golden_list.note_number_people: This column shows the number of people who did a challenge
top_golden_list.note_video_link: These links lead to the video of the first clear of a challenge

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this account? This action is irreversible.

edit_maps.confirm_delete_one: Please confirm that you want to delete 1 map. This cannot be undone!
edit_maps.confirm_delete_other: Please confirm that you want to delete {{count}} maps. This cannot be undone!
edit_maps.confirm_delete_label_one: Yes, delete '1' map and all attached challenges & submissions.
edit_maps.confirm_delete_label_other: Yes, delete '{{count}}' maps and all attached challenges & submissions.

step_1.helper: Each line corresponds to a map name.
step_1.label: Map Names

step_2.helper: Specify which challenges to generate for each map.

challenge.full_game_notice: Not selecting a map will mean it's a full game challenge.

map.author_note: Leave these blank if they match the author of the campaign.

submission.personal_note: 'Personal' difficulty suggestions indicate that this suggestion should not be used for difficulty placements

player_rename.label: Player Rename
player_rename.log_change: Log the rename in the player's changelog

player_delete.label: Player Delete
player_delete.note: Deleting a player cannot be undone and will remove all associated submissions!
player_delete.confirm: I understand that this action is irreversible

delete_campaign.title: Delete Campaign
delete_campaign.description: Are you sure you want to delete the campaign '{{name}}' and all of the attached maps, challenges and submissions?

delete_map.title: Delete Map
delete_map.description: Are you sure you want to delete the map '{{name}}' and all of the attached challenges and submissions?

delete_challenge.title: Delete Challenge
delete_challenge.description: Are you sure you want to delete the challenge '{{name}}' for the map '{{map}}' and all of the attached submissions?

mark_personal.title: Mark As Personal
mark_personal.description: Mark all difficulty suggestions for '{{name}}' as personal?
mark_personal.impacted_one: At most 1 submission will be impacted.
mark_personal.impacted_other: At most {{count}} submissions will be impacted.

merge_split_challenges.title: Split/Merge Challenges
merge_split_challenges.split_note: This challenge will be split from a single C/FC challenge into 2 separate challenges. All FC submissions will be automatically moved to the FC challenge.
merge_split_challenges.merge_note: The submissions of the 2nd challenge will be merged into the first challenge. The first challenge will be modified accordingly, and the 2nd challenge deleted after all submissions have been moved.
merge_split_challenges.unable_to_merge: These challenges cannot be merged. You can only merge a regular clear challenge with an FC challenge.

feedback.viewing_gone: The submission you were viewing is no longer in the queue. It was either deleted or verified by someone else
feedback.all_verified: All selected submissions have been verified
feedback.all_rejected: All selected submissions have been rejected

server_costs.title: Server Costs
server_costs.description: Hi, viddie here. Unsurprisingly, running servers costs money, and while I can pour in as much time as I like into creating this project, someone has to pay to keep the server running. This website does not (and will never) have ADs. I am willing to pay for the server costs all by myself if necessary, but if anyone in the community wants to help me out, I would gladly appreciate it!

costs_so_far.title: Costs So Far
costs_so_far.description: The server has been running since April, 2024. That's {{months}} months so far.
costs_so_far.not_lose: This is the amount of € that I need to not lose money

stocked_up.title: Stocked Up
stocked_up.description: The server can run for {{months}} more months on just donations!

you_can_help.title: You Can Help
you_can_help.description: If you want to help keep the server running, you can donate using the following methods:

table.note: * Donations do not update automatically, it might take a bit for your donation to show up.

thank_you.title: Thank You
thank_you.description: If you donate and want to be mentioned on this page, leave a name in your donation message!

post_donation.text: I appreciate it! Do note that donations aren't automatically put on the list of Contributors, so it might take a while for your donation to be added!

account.title: My Account
account.no_player_claimed: You haven't claimed a player yet. Head over to <CustomLink>this page</CustomLink> to create or claim one!

login_methods.label: Login Methods
login_methods.note: Note: One of the login methods must always be active!

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.note: Note: Currently these notifications will be sent as Discord pings in the official Modded Golden Discord Server. To get a notification, you need to join that server (<CustomLink1>invite link</CustomLink1>) AND have your Discord account linked to your goldberries.net account <CustomLink2>here</CustomLink2>!

sub_verified.label: Submission Verified
sub_verified.description: To get notified when your submission gets verified or rejected

marked_personal.label: Difficulty Suggestion Marked Personal
marked_personal.description: To get notified when a difficulty suggestion from you gets marked as 'personal', due to new major strats being discovered

challenge_moved.label: Challenge Moved
challenge_moved.description: To get notified when a challenge you have completed gets moved to a different difficulty

suggestion_created.label: Suggestion Created
suggestion_created.description: To get notified when a suggestion for a challenge you have completed is created

custom_links.label: Custom Links
custom_links.note: You can add custom links to your profile. This can be a link to your speedrun.com profile, a link to your YouTube channel, or any other link you want to share with the community.

showcase.label: Showcase
showcase.title: Submission Showcase
showcase.no_player_claimed: You need to have a player claimed to use this feature!
showcase.note_1: Select up to 9 submissions which should be shown on your player profile!
showcase.note_2: Note: Not selecting any submissions will make the 9 highest placed submissions be shown instead.

player_rename.label: Player Rename
player_rename.title: Rename your Player
player_rename.no_player_claimed: You don't have a player claimed yet!
player_rename.description: Give your player a new name. This can be done once every 24 hours.
player_rename.cannot_rename: You can rename your player again in {{time}}.
player_rename.log_change: Log the rename in your player's changelog

danger_zone.label: Danger Zone
danger_zone.note: Please note that this does not delete your associated player! Any submissions will remain unchanged, and your 'player' will become unclaimed again. If you want to remove your name from this website or mass delete your own submissions, contact a team member!

name_colors.label: Player Name Colors
name_colors.prefer_solid_color: Prefer Solid Color Over Gradient Color

blur.label: Background Blur
blur.tooltip: Gaussian Blur applied to the background

custom.label: Custom Background
custom.tooltip: If set, replaces the selected background from above

darken_colors.label: Darken Tier Colors
darken_colors.tooltip: In dark-mode, makes the tier colors darker. 0% doesn't change the colors, 100% makes them entirely black.
darken_colors.note: This setting only affects the dark-mode colors!

campaign_icons.label: Show Campaign Icons
campaign_icons.note: Shows popular campaign's icons, such as SJ, SC, D-Sides...

text_fc_icons.label: Use Text FC Icons
text_fc_icons.note: This will replace the flag icons with [C], [FC] and [C/FC] 'icons'

switch_order.label: Switch Map and Challenge
switch_order.note: Switches from 'Segment Name [Map Name]' to 'Map Name [Segment Name]' format

difficulty_colors.label: Difficulty Colors
difficulty_colors.description: High and Low subtier colors are calculated based on the Mid color. You can overwrite this by explicitly setting the High and Low subtier colors.

link_success.title: Player claimed!
link_success.info: You have successfully claimed your player. You can now submit runs!

make_claim.title: Claim Player
make_claim.info: Your account is not linked to a player yet. If you have made submissions on the old spreadsheet, you should claim your player with the same name. Otherwise you can create a new player.

create.title: Create New Player

feedback.name_short: Player name must be at least 3 characters long

create.info: Please enter the name you want to have on the list. If you already have existing submissions from the old spreadsheet, please go back and select "Link Existing Player".

link.title: Claim Existing Player
link.info_1: If you have made submission for the old spreadsheet, you can claim these for your account.
link.info_2: After making a claim, you will have to contact a team member directly, in order to verify that you are who you claim to be!
link.confirm: I confirm that I am the player shown in the video

claim_made.title: Player claim submitted!
claim_made.info: Your claim has been submitted! Please contact one of the verifiers on Discord (or some other way) to verify your claim. An @ in the <CustomLink>Modded Golden Team Discord</CustomLink> should be enough in most cases!

403.description: You don't have permission to access this page.

no_player_claimed.title: Your account is missing setup!
no_player_claimed.description: Please go to <CustomLink>this page</CustomLink> to create a new player, or claim an existing one!

error_pages.404: This requested page does not exist
